name: Schizopill
description:
Schizopill - Game for the 32Bits Jam.

It's a little game, actually the first that I completed, if theres any bug just tell me and i will try to learn about it for the future.

THIS GAME MAYBE ISN'T THAT ACURATE ABOUT THE SCHIZOPHRENIA, IT JUST FOR ENTERTAINMENT

(also i want to warn that im not the best writing in English)

I didn't test the game in MAC or Linux, so i don't know if there are errors

I didn't know that the word schizopill existed, but recently i found that it does, and just want to tell that this is no related to that meaning .

just that
